评论详情: I look like I have a weenie and the jacket fits like crap. I definitely don’t recommend that anyone buy this.
Managed to snag this set for $8.00 super thick material looks much better in person the pictures don’t do the clothes justice!! I ordered a xxl and it fits perfectly I’m roughly between 200-210
Need to get in other colors very comfortable
Small

I love this set. It's super comfy. I got a medium and am happy with the size of the hoodie top but the shorts are a little bigger than I would have thought. (I am 5'4" and 125ish lbs) I'm okay with that because I got this to be a cozy set for around the house but just FYI.
Runs very small and had small holes in it
The material feels very cheap not soft. Will be returning.
They said they loved it
It’s the cutest …. Loved it as casual wear and for some good hikes ❤️
Love the style

I got the medium and found that the top fits but the pants are way too big. The styling is a bit weird. It's made from a warm and thick material but comes with shorts. I liked the color and feel of the fabric which seems to be good quality. It's really dependant on your body shape whether it will fit you as expected.

评论概述: Cute but did not fit well
评论详情: Sweatshirt was too small and the shorts had an odd fit. Good quality material though. I had to return it as it was not the right fit for me overall.
The top is decent but the bottoms are hideous. They are super bulky and just not flattering. They are comfortable and the material is soft. The color is true to the picture.
My daughter loves this cute loungewear.
The top is cut to be a crop top and the shorts have a short inseam. Sizing is correct but just too short on top and bottom.
Not flattering
I really liked this because it was cute, so I was really excited to feel how soft it was. It’s one of my favorite jogging outfits now. Overall: very happy
Comfortable material and fits great. Great for working out or house work.

评论概述: Shirt rides up on your neck
评论详情: True to size and very soft however the front of the shirt rides up on your neck and you are uncomfortable because of the zipper.

评论概述: Pay attention to the size chart!
评论详情: Thankfully I paid attention to the size chart because I had to size up for my teen to make sure it would fit her based off the measurements. She says both the hoodie and shorts are comfy and soft. Keeps shape after washing/drying.

I absolutely love this two-piece sweatshirt outfit. Both pieces fit true to size and are so warm and comfy. I live in the Midwest, so I’m always looking for something to keep me warm as I am a double above knee amputee. This outfit definitely is worth it highly recommend.

This is probably one of the best jogger sets I’ve received here on Amazon. Thick, plush sweatshirt material we’ve all come to love over the years. My only complaint is that my bust to hip ratio is very different.  In order to accommodate my hips I had to go up several sizes making the top waaaay too large!  Something else to keep in mind is that this is a heavier material so you might be hot on top and cold in the legs d/t the shorts.

评论概述: So nice, I want to get another set!
评论详情: I was happy to have the chance to review this outfit. The fabric is a nice thickness. It's not super thin. I tried on the pullover jacket and it was warm and comfortable. The sizing is generous- you can order your normal clothing size without any worries! The sleeves go all the way down to my wrists, as well. (Being a taller woman, sometimes this is not the case!) I thought the jacket looked like a cropped jacket, but it did go down to the top of my hip, and not mid-waist. I was pleased about that! Bonus: The jacket also has pockets!! The shorts are just as generously sized and comfortable. I chose to get the apricot color and it looks just as nice in person as it did on the site. This is an outfit that I can see myself wearing often in the spring, and any time I am going to the gym. I may order another set in a different color, because I like it so much!

Arrived well packaged, as described. As always when ordering clothing items from Amazon, I’ve found that following the size chart is best. With so many brands from manufacturers to be found, it helps to avoid disappointment and less returns. Normally I’m a small in items such as this. Because the sizing for the shorts puts me at a Medium with the top being Small. I chose to size up for best fit. Happy to say it worked out perfect, a little oversized in a good way. Casual and sporty look. Super cute with a pair of sneakers or sandals. Mid weight design makes for all season wear. Well constructed with no sloppy loose threads. Washes well, comes out of the dryer wrinkle free. Great value for a nice quality set I feel will last for some time.  Thanks for taking the time to read my review. I do my best to share areas that are of importance to me. Hope I’ve been somewhat helpful to you. All thoughts are my own, not influenced in any way. Enjoy and Happy Shopping!

I purchased this set as a cute and comfy tracksuit set, however, the top is very cropped. It did not say cropped in the description, which is why I purchased it, for a full length sweatshirt top. The material is okay and is a bit comfy. Overall, it would be perfect if the top wasn’t so short. The shorts fit well
Color was not as pictured.  I was expecting a soft pink and it is a dull not very pretty pink

评论概述: Warm on the top, cold on the bottom! Runs small!
评论详情: I got this 2 piece outfit! The top is a little bit bulky, warm, which is definitely for colder days! The color is a pinky cream, niece, not too pale! At the beginning I thought the top will be itchy but wearing for a couple of hours is not itchy which is good! Wearing M size! Normally I wear S size, this outfit runs Small!  5.4 feet 125lb 35-25-36 M size fits good! Maybe I will wear it separately the top when is very cold and the short with a shirt when is warmer outside!  The band on the top is not super elastic and Overall the outfit is not from a strechy fabric! It's from firm fabric! Overall very good for running errands!

评论概述: I love this.  Comfortable, thick and beautiful.
评论详情: This is by far one of my favorite sweat shirts and to add the shorts, amazing. The thickness and soft material is everything you want in relaxation situation.

I got the set in green and the color is just like the pictures!  (maybe a hind more muted but barely)  I got an XL in hopes that the top would be a big less cropped and it was.  My only downside was that I would have liked more stretch overall in the top.  It has very little stretch when getting it on and off.  If you are super tiny this might not be an issue, but getting these over 38DD's was not as comfortable as I would have preferred.  I still really like this outfit, although personally I plan to wear them separately.  (not a short and hoodie type person)  The shorts were comfortable lounge wear for me.  I wore the top over jeans and it looked really cute and hit just below my waist but rises if you raise your arms.
I got this outfit for my 14 year old daughter.  She is about 5'4" and weighs about 140 lbs. I got a medium and it fits her well.  It's made well and is a soft material.

Fit is as expected, very comfy and soft. Slight and very slight oversized comfy fit as one should expect for this type of wear. Stitching looks good, survived a couple washes and has a nice worn in feel off the bat.

This is an attractive 2 piece set. It comes with a hoodie, that has pockets. I has somewhat of a silky exterior and fleece type lining, It’s on the lighter side, so it’s a ittle too cold now for wearing around the house. But definitely more appropriate for warmer weather.  My wife likes the styling as well as comfort.  Looks very nice.
This was not true to size, or ever a size smaller. The material has no give. I would our 2 sizes up from your normal.

This was provided for review as part of the Amazon Vine program  This set is nice, the green color I picked is just as pictured-- I love when the advertised color of an item matches it when you receive it in person. The material is alright, not the softest but not itchy or scratchy. I would say that in the model the top looks somewhat more fitted though, while in person it is more of a square box type of fit. Overall I think it is a nice set, I just wish it was softer.

The color on my photo looks alot darker but in real life it is the same as the stock photo.  The material is like a soft cotton. Just like a sweatsuit. Warm and confy. Nice color. Nice design. Fit is spot on. I would size up for a more comfy fit.
Heavy materials and will keep you warm. I sized up 2 sizes for more relax fit. The sweater is my fave with the high neck to keep the cold wind out. The shorts are great and not super short.

I am in love with functional yet fun short sets. However, I’m not sure how I feel about this one yet. The shirt is more of a crop top look than expected which makes it less comfortable overall. Just something to be mindful of if that’s not your style.
The sweatshirt is just one of those cropped half sweatshirts. I didn’t realize that. Otherwise it’s nice and soft

This is a nice outfit. It's soft in material and offers pockets on the shorts and the sweater top. The top is a bit short but my wife likes it. The shorts are nice length. I love the fact that there's a hoodie and it actually covers my wife's entire head.

So soft and comfortable short set. I was worried it would be bulky but the thickness of the material isn’t as heavy as pictures make it look. I’m 5’4 185 lbs and wear between 10-12 in clothing. I decided to go with the large instead of x-large based on the chart and I’m losing weight. It’s more fitted to my body because of this. So I would size up if you’re in between clothing sizes and want a loose fit; size down if you want it snug. Two things I’m not thrilled about: the top seems more like a crop top than hip/oversized and the crotch area of the shorts is a little long on me even after I pull them up to close up the space with the top.
